title: Exclude certain groups from IdM synchronization
content:
If you want to ignore some groups during the synchronization from IdM to UCMDB, you can configure a filter in Infrastructure Settings Management. 

To do this, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to UCMDB UI as an administrator: https://<External_Access_Host>:<Port>/ucmdb-browser?customerID=xxxxxxxxx
  2. Click the menu icon on the upper left corner, and then navigate to Administration > Infrastructure Settings Management.

  3. From the Search by name search box, search for "prefix" to locate the Set the prefix name of the groups you want to ignore during IDM synchronization setting.

    Note: To see this setting from the search result, make sure that <All> is selected in the Categories pane.
  4. Edit the Value field by adding the prefix or the full name of the group that you want to ignore during the IdM synchronization.
    Use a semicolon (;) to separate multiple values. The group name here is the Name filed in IdM or the User principal name field in the Service Management agent interface. In the following example, "CAB_" is added to the Value field to prevent the CAB Group in Service Management from being synchronized to UCMDB. 
  5. Click SAVE.
